posts.post_content:
Selling off a couple of T206's to make room for new stuff. "I'll take it" takes precedence over any ongoing negotiations.

All prices include shipping. PPFF preferred.

Hal Chase with Trophy - Polar Bear - PSA 1 Charles Bray Collection $100 $old
Bill Carrigan - Piedmont 350 - SGC 3 - $75 $old

Please PM if interested.


Thanks for looking!
Bump for a couple of quick price reductions.
